meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Peter Perl Dee Ann Redman Jeff Richmond Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #996.

td.p: Peter Perl, a newspaper editor from Washington, D.C.
Dee Ann Redman, a sales representative from Billings, Montana
Jeff Richmond, a city planner from West Hollywood, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $6,300)

tr.td: U.S.A.
NICKNAMES
THE BIBLE
HOLLYWOOD MARRIAGES
GUINNESS RECORDS
JEOPARDY! KEY WORDS
(Alex: These are words or short phrases we have used often enough that they have become synonymous with those people.)

')
